data.title: 4th parliamentary term
data.meta_description: Profile page - Jean-Pierre RAFFARIN - Profile page of a current Member of the European Parliament - History of parliamentary service during the 4th legislative term including memberships in political groups, national parties, parliamentary committees and delegations as well as parliamentary activities and the declaration of financial interests.
data.text:
